snippet: The health secretary ordered a review into the safety and quality of private clinics offering the cosmetic surgery following a health scare over breast implants made by a now defunct French company.
abstract: British health secretary Andrew Lansley orders a review into the safety and quality of private clinics offering cosmetic surgery following health scare over breast implants made by a now defunct French company.
lead_paragraph: The health secretary ordered a review into the safety and quality of private clinics offering the cosmetic surgery following a health scare over breast implants made by a now defunct French company.

headline.main: Britain: More Regulation Weighed in Wake of Breast Implant Scandal
headline.print_headline: Britain: More Regulation Weighed In Wake of Breast Implant Scandal
